content:
alexcrichton opened PR #11619 from alexcrichton:refactor-some-file-streams to bytecodealliance:main:

  • Deduplicate write/append streams
  • Deduplicate poll-the-task and spawn-the-task-then-poll
  • Explicitly ignore the finish flag

    this can be brief.
